article.title: Northrop Grumman Wins Saudi Arabian National Guard Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Army has awarded Northrop Grumman Corporation a contract with a potential value of $550 million to continue the modernization and training of the Saudi Arabian National Guard (SANG). Under the contract, the company will provide U.S. Army based doctrine and military training as well as logistics and support services to contribute to the SANG's ability to fulfill its mission with self-sustained command, control and operational capabilities.
